title: Digital Transformation
description: Led strategic technical initiatives for enterprise-wide digital transformation, driving adoption of ADEO Group's core Loyalty and Master Data platforms across Brazil operations, impacting more than 6 million users.
highlights: Coordinate international stakeholder alignment
Conduct technical negotiations in English with global teams
Define technical roadmaps through ADR processes
Drive cross-functional collaboration between local and international teams

title: High-Traffic System Optimization
description: Optimized high-traffic customer journey performance by redesigning queue system architecture, achieving 80% latency reduction and maintaining SLA/SLO compliance for critical metrics.
highlights: Redesigned queue system architecture for primary service
Achieved 80% latency reduction
Maintained SLA/SLO compliance for Availability and APDEX metrics
Improved overall system performance and user experience

title: Team Performance Transformation
description: Transformed underperforming team into company reference by implementing rigorous code review standards, resulting in 70% increase in Deployment Frequency and 74% reduction in Change Failure Rate in 6 months.

metrics.teamTransformation: From 'major offender' to company reference in 6 months

highlights: Implemented rigorous code review standards
Established traceability between tickets and code development
Elevated team reputation from 'major offender' status
Successful delivery of crucial company initiatives

title: Critical System Recovery
description: Resolved critical architectural issues in PubSub implementation causing transactional problems, designing ADR-backed solutions that reduced production incidents by 64%.
highlights: Resolved critical PubSub implementation issues
Designed ADR-backed solutions
Reduced production incidents by 64%
Significantly improved system reliability

title: Military IT Infrastructure Management
description: Led IT infrastructure management for military organization, overseeing network administration, inventory management, and telecommunications systems with 99%+ uptime in high-compliance environment.
highlights: Led IT infrastructure for military organization
Managed critical mission systems
Provided technical mentorship to junior team members

title: V-Gutierrez CMS - Developer Portfolio CMS
description: Built a minimalist, Git-based CMS for showcasing technical achievements and impact metrics. Designed with simplicity, low maintenance, and pragmatic deployment using GitHub Pages.
highlights: Created a simple, maintainable CMS powered by Git and Markdown
Focused on performance, clarity e impacto técnico direto
Served as public-facing evidence of engineering leadership

title: Canaryo CLI – Local Kubernetes Deployment Tool
description: Designed and implemented a developer-friendly CLI for deploying applications to local Kubernetes clusters with minimal configuration. Canaryo auto-detects runtime settings, simplifies manifest generation, and streamlines management tasks. Code available

metrics.runtimeSupport: Auto-detects Node.js, Python, Java, Go, Nginx

highlights: Auto-generates optimized manifests based on Dockerfile analysis
Supports full lifecycle: deploy, scale, monitor, and delete apps
Interactive interface designed for fast iteration and feedback

title: Vivant
description: Built a complete performance testing suite. Vivant enables realistic load simulations with an interactive CLI, environment presets, and real-time monitoring via Grafana and InfluxDB. Vivant is closed-source for now

metrics.scenarioCoverage: 12+ built-in scenarios (smoke, stress, spike, soak, CRUD variants)
metrics.observability: Custom Grafana dashboards with real-time metrics (P95, error rates, throughput)

highlights: Developed an interactive CLI for managing realistic API load tests
Enabled test presets, auto data generation
Integrated with InfluxDB and Grafana for detailed observability
Supported operational workflows with environment switching and backups
Designed for high-confidence testing before production deployments

title: Genesis Church App – Community Platform
description: Designed and developed a full-stack church community platform for Genesis Church in Argentina, integrating a mobile-friendly PWA frontend with a scalable backend API. Combined modern web technologies with real-world needs like offline access, event scheduling, push notifications, and Google Maps integration.

metrics.userEngagement: More than 1000 users engaging in event registration, news updates, push alerts

highlights: Developed a responsive PWA for community access across devices
Built a RESTful backend API with secure auth and admin roles
Received more than 1k users in peak dates

title: Codebase Expert – Natural Language Codebase Explorer
description: Developed a CLI-based tool that allows developers to query codebases using natural language, powered by Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embeddings, and open-source LLMs. Bridges human understanding and complex systems through intelligent contextual search.
highlights: Built a developer tool for querying codebases with plain English
Integrated LangChain with HuggingFace and Chroma DB
Implemented full Retrieval-Augmented Generation workflow
Supports dynamic embedding generation for new codebases
Used successfully with real-world backends (e.g. Genesis App)

title: Talk: Why Does ChatGPT Seem Smarter Than You?
description: Delivered an invited talk at DevSummit 2025 (ADEO, Ronchin – France), exploring the intersections of Artificial Intelligence, Language, and Human Behavior. Shared practical insights and ethical considerations for critically engaging with generative AI technologies like ChatGPT.
highlights: Explained LLMs using everyday metaphors and critical reasoning
Connected AI behavior with human cognitive biases and perception
Encouraged ethical, conscious adoption of generative technologies
Reconnected with peers from Leroy Merlin Brazil and across ADEO
Represented Brazil in a global, cross-cultural innovation event

title: Strategic Data Migration
description: Co-led the strategic migration of 17.5 million customer records from the legacy system to the Master Data Management (MDM) platform. Ensured high-integrity, high-volume data transfer within tight deadlines, enabling unified customer profiles across enterprise systems.

metrics.integrationLayer: Existing FACADE reused as transformation layer

highlights: Co-led large-scale migration of 17.5M customer records from legacy systems to MDM
Reused existing FACADE integration to streamline implementation and reduce risk
Established Go-Live plan with minimal downtime and risk
